Где я могу отследить статус моей заявки?: Where can I track the status of my application?
Статус заявки можно отследить в Личном к: The status of the application can be tracked in the Personal Account in the "application" section (the login and password from which will be sent to your mail, during registration, or when you first create an application). We will also notify you of the status of your application by email.
Требуется ли регистрация для осуществлен: Is registration required to make an exchange?
В обменном сервисе Magnitiks происходит: In the Magnitiks exchange service, automatic registration occurs when the first application is created. Upon completion of the exchange, you will be sent an email to log in to your personal account.
Для чего нужны подтверждения в системе b: Why do you need confirmations in the bitcoin system?
При получении bitcoin монет, получатель: When receiving bitcoin coins, the recipient cannot immediately use them. Once a transfer is made, it is sent to the Bitcoin network for execution and must be included in a block to become confirmed. The process of including a transfer in the found block is called transaction confirmation. Inclusion in 1 block = 1 confirmation, when there are 2 or more such confirmations, the transfer is considered confirmed, and Well4u.ru operators, in turn, process the request. This method was introduced to protect against reuse of the same bitcoins.
Сколько длится обмен?: How long does the exchange take?
Скорость обмена составляет от 1 до 30 ми: The exchange rate is from 1 to 30 minutes, the countdown starts from the moment the payment is received on the application.
Минимальная сумма обмена по конкретному: The minimum exchange amount for a specific exchange direction is displayed on the exchange page in the yellow field.
Возможно ли отменить заявку?: Is it possible to cancel an application?
Если заявка была обработана, то средства: If the application has been processed, then the funds are non-refundable. If the application was paid, but was not executed, you need to write to the operator. You will be able to return the funds minus the transfer fee.
Как я могу отслеживать статус моей заявк: How can I track the status of my application?
Статус заявки можно узнать в Личном каби: The status of the application can be found in the Personal account of the service in the item "My applications". In addition, information on the status of the application will automatically be sent to the e-mail address that you indicated at the time of making the application for the exchange.

Политика противодействия отмыванию денег: Anti-money laundering and illegal transactions policy
Платежная система – созданный третьей ст: Payment system - a software package created by a third party, through which digital currency units, electronic money and other obligations are accounted for, mutual settlements of users are organized, etc.
Операции (платежи) – это осуществление\n: Operations (payments) are the transfer of digital currency (electronic money) from the sender's account to the recipient's account.
Исходная электронная валюта – это та вал: The original electronic currency is the currency that is available to the user, and which he wants to exchange or sell, receiving in return other electronic currency or money in a different form.
Полученная валюта – это та валюта, котор: The received currency is the currency that the user of the Well4u.ru service receives as a result of the exchange, transferring the original currency of the service.
Стороны – это все пользователи, которые\: Parties are all users who unconditionally accepted the rules specified in this agreement and decided to use the services of the Well4u.ru service, as well as the Well4u.ru service itself.
Обмен валюты – это совершение операции п: Currency exchange is a transaction for the exchange of electronic currency of various payment systems.
Резервы валют – это количество электронн: Currency reserves - this is the amount of electronic money that the Well4u.ru service has in its possession, and within which users can carry out exchange transactions through this service. Each user can get up-to-date information on the amount of reserves by visiting the main page of this service
Курс – это соотношение одной электронной: The rate is the ratio of one electronic currency in relation to another in the process of making an exchange.
Электронные деньги (электронная валюта): Electronic money (electronic currency) is monetary or other obligations that arise between persons using this currency and those who created it. The mentioned obligations are in digital form.

Платежная система – созданный третьей ст: Payment system - a software package created by a third party, through which digital currency units, electronic money and other obligations are accounted for, mutual settlements of users are organized, etc.
Электронные деньги (электронная валюта): Electronic money (electronic currency) is monetary or other obligations that arise between persons using this currency and those who created it. The mentioned obligations are in digital form.
Операции (платежи) – это осуществление\n: Operations (payments) are the transfer of digital currency (electronic money) from the sender's account to the recipient's account.
Исходная электронная валюта – это та вал: The original electronic currency is the currency that is available to the user, and which he wants to exchange or sell, receiving in return other electronic currency or money in a different form.
Обмен валюты – это совершение операции п: Currency exchange is a transaction for the exchange of electronic currency of various payment systems.
Курс – это соотношение одной электронной: The rate is the ratio of one electronic currency in relation to another in the process of making an exchange.

Все последующие Заявки, созданные Пользо: All subsequent Applications created by the User after the Service refuses to further service the User are automatically frozen.
Сервис имеет право задержать выполнение: The Service has the right to delay the execution of the transaction until the identification of the User's identity, by means of a phone call, as well as in other ways that do not contradict the current legislation.
Учет операций с электронными единицами п: Accounting for transactions with electronic units is carried out by the Service in accordance with the regulations, rules and format of the relevant Electronic Settlement Systems.
Управление процессом обмена или получени: Management of the exchange process or obtaining information about the progress of the service by the User is carried out using the appropriate user interface located on the website of the Service.
Обработка Заявок Пользователя осуществля: The processing of the User's Applications is carried out by the Service in strict accordance with the privacy policy (clause 5 of this agreement), as well as the policy to combat money laundering and prevent transactions that are illegal (clause 6 of this agreement).
Любая завершенная операция, проведенная: Any completed operation carried out by the Service at the request of the User is considered irrevocable, i.e. cannot be canceled by the User after its completion - receipt by the User of what is due to him under previously accepted terms of the transaction.
Мы рады приветствовать Вас на страницах: We are glad to welcome you on the pages of our exchange site! On our site you can quickly and reliably exchange the electronic currency you are interested in. Your exchange data is not stored on our service and is not provided to third parties, which guarantees 100% anonymity of the exchanges made.
Мы всегда готовы ответить на интересующи: We are always ready to answer your questions and listen to your suggestions to improve our service.
Настоящее соглашение описывает правила и: This agreement describes the rules and conditions on the basis of which the services of the Buymon.ru service are provided and is an official written public offer addressed to individuals (hereinafter referred to as the User), to conclude an Agreement on the provision of services by the Buymon.ru service on the terms set forth below. Before using the services of the Buymon.ru service, the User is obliged to fully familiarize himself with the terms of the “Agreement for the provision of services by the Buymon.ru service”. Using the services of the Buymon.ru service is possible only if the User accepts all the terms of the Agreement. The current version of the Agreement is located for public access on the website of the Buymon.ru service.
В обменном сервисе Buymon происходит авт: In the Buymon exchange service, automatic registration occurs when the first order is created. Upon completion of the exchange, you will be sent an email with the data to enter your personal account.
При получении bitcoin монет, получатель: When receiving bitcoin coins, the recipient cannot immediately use them. Once a transfer is made, it is sent to the Bitcoin network for execution and must be included in a block to become confirmed. The process of including a transfer in the found block is called transaction confirmation. Inclusion in 1 block = 1 confirmation, when there are 2 or more such confirmations, the transfer is considered confirmed, and Magnitiks.ru operators, in turn, process the request. This method was introduced to protect against reuse of the same bitcoins.

Сервис Buymon.ru (далее - Сервис) – серв: The Buymon.ru service (hereinafter referred to as the Service) is a service that provides services to individuals and legal entities in terms of exchanging, buying or selling electronic currency. These services are provided through a special software package available at https://Buymon.ru/.
Пользователь – это юридическое / физичес: The user is a legal / natural person who has unconditionally accepted all the conditions of this offer and uses the services of the Magnitiks.ru service
Размер вознаграждения Сервиса Buymon.ru: The amount of the Buymon.ru Service remuneration for the specified actions is reflected in the Application and confirmed by the User on one of the pages of the user interface.
Стоимость услуг Сервиса Buymon.ru устана: The cost of the services of the Magnitiks.ru Service is set by the Service management and published on the Service's website.
Сервис Buymon.ru вправе самостоятельно и: The Buymon.ru Service has the right to independently change the exchange rates of Electronic currencies and charged commissions at any time unilaterally, and notifies the Users of the Service by preliminary posting information about these changes on the Internet site of the Service.
Сервис Buymon.ru взимает стоимость своег: The Buymon.ru service charges the cost of its fee at the time of the relevant Transaction.
Сервис Buymon.ru вправе отправлять Польз: The Buymon.ru service has the right to send the User information on the status of the exchange process, as well as other information, including advertising, to the e-mail specified by him.
Информация на сайте, включая графические: Information on the site, including graphic images, textual information, program codes, etc. is the property of the Buymon.ru website and is protected by copyright laws. Each case of unauthorized copying (full or partial) can be prosecuted under applicable law.
Пользователь подтверждает, что он ознако: The User confirms that he has read all the provisions of this Agreement and unconditionally accepts them, otherwise the User cannot use the Buymon.ru Service.
Полученная валюта – это та валюта, котор: The received currency is the currency that the user of the Buymon.ru service receives as a result of the exchange, transferring the original currency of the service.
Стороны – это все пользователи, которые\: Parties are all users who unconditionally accepted the rules specified in this agreement and decided to use the services of the Magnitiks.ru service, as well as the Magnitiks.ru service itself
Резервы валют – это количество электронн: Currency reserves - this is the amount of electronic money that the Buymon.ru service has in its possession, and within which users can carry out exchange transactions through this service. Each user can get up-to-date information on the amount of reserves by visiting the main page of this service
В случае поступления суммы от Пользовате: In case of receipt of an amount from the User, the amount of which differs from that specified in the application, the "Buymon.ru" service may suspend the exchange, and after the User's request, pay the actually received amount at the rate that was in effect at the beginning of the operation.
Пользователь, указавший неверные реквизи: The user who has indicated incorrect details for the exchange undertakes to provide the correct details for the exchange within three months from the date of creation of the application. Otherwise, all funds are at the disposal of the Magnitiks.ru service.
Все средства, поступившие в адрес сервис: All funds received by the Buymon.ru service without creating requests are placed at the disposal of the service.
В соответствии с международным законодат: In accordance with international law, Buymon.ru adheres to a number of rules and implements a number of procedures aimed at preventing the use of the Service for the purpose of conducting money laundering operations, that is, actions aimed at returning money or other securities of illegal origin to the financial and economic market, representing their acquisition and possession is quite legal and normal, as well as carrying out other operations that are illegal.
Заказ услуг Сервисом Buymon.ru осуществл: Ordering services by the Buymon.ru Service is carried out by the User by sending an Application through the Service's website.
Заявка – конкретное намерение посетителя: Application - a specific intention of a visitor to the Buymon.ru resource to use its services by accepting the relevant rules of this offer. This intention is expressed in the form of the user providing information and its transfer to the service through a special electronic form, which is located on the Buymon.ru resource.
When using the services of the Buymon.ru Service, the User confirms that he legally owns and disposes of the funds and electronic currency involved in the relevant Payment.
